input_email_body:
Subject: Report on Security Breach Customer Support Team,
An unauthorized access incident has occurred, which may have exposed patient medical data and compromised hospital systems You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com..
Potential causes include weak access controls and outdated software.
My name is Jane Smith.
